conversation.message_text: Igloo: Welcome to Igloo! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.
Igloo: Hey this is Sarah, how can I help you?
Hi! I'm trying to find the 10 gallon jug in blue
I need3-4 of them
They're only online with the Lowe's emblem and I need it without that

Igloo: Good morning! I'm sorry, I currently don't have the exact date of a possible restock, but I recommend checking our website and social media frequently. In the meantime, what do you think about this instead? https://igloo.attn.tv/a_oEFLlXuBIA It features a handy cup dispenser, a pressure-fit lid that won't spill, and the kind of industry-leading cold retention you to keep your drink cold and refreshing on long, hot days.
Ok. I'll keep an eye out
I would really like the 10 gallon in blue. Is there a planned restock
Igloo: I'm afraid I don't have a specific date at this time. If it helps, we do have 5 Gallon Seat Top Water Jugs With Cup Dispenser. Take a look here: https://igloo.attn.tv/a4z1VYUFfLM5

send_to_cs: Send to CS for legal and fraud related inquires
Send to CS for product safety inquires and threats
Send to CS for website technical issues
escalate: ESC if cx claims bodily injury as result of a product
ESC if cx highlights dangers to health/safety as a result of product
templates: For all post-purchase & warranty inquiries use "SUPPORT" temp (SPT)
For discount code issues use "SUPPORT" temp (SPT)
For product info that you can't find on the site use "SUPPORT" temp (SPT)
If cx reach out about 90 qt cooler recall, use shortcut RCC
For custom order cancellation and edit requests, don't use CED, use the designated templates instead
